title: Cris Gova Video Editor
description: A video editor portfolio with an integrated blog, featuring an administration area by Express and MongoDB for content creation via a RESTful API

title: Agencia de empleo
description: Immersive VR experience provided by the employment agency, featuring an OpenAI-trained avatar, with an administration interface to modify all scene content via API.

title: Retiro 360
description: Inmersive 360 virtual tour combining Three Js responsive-based technologies with schedule of activities and exhibitions.

title: Viva-Film
description: Viva Film is a web project that showcases a film community platform, highlighting film examples, cameras and lenses.

title: Next Play
description: Is an minimalism aesthetically pleasing and responsive web music application built using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Spotify and the Unsplash API.

title: Nasa Api
description: Project implemented in React with Next.js, focusing on information services via NASA API, integrating the Picture of the Day, EPIC camera, and data files, styled with Tailwind.
